author: Oliver O'Connell, Oliver O'Connell
title: Coronavirus: Florida governor adds exemption for churches in stay-at-home order
description: New state guidelines 'shall supersede any conflicting official action or order issued by local officials in response to Covid-19'
content:
Just hours after Florida governor Ron DeSantis finally issued a statewide stay-at-home order on Wednesday to stop the spread of the coronavirus, he signed a second order overriding any restrictions on movement or gathering put in place by local authorities.
… [+1987 chars]
